name: array_rand
purpose: Pick one or more random entries out of an array

return.description:
If you are picking only one entry, array_rand
   returns the key for a random entry. Otherwise, it returns an array
   of keys for the random entries. This is done so that you can pick
   random keys as well as values out of the array.

changelog.change: The resulting array of keys is no longer shuffled.

The random
number generator is seeded automatically.
